TopicTitle: Has Kerbin atmosphere been raised by 1 km?

Articles.Content: Before 1.0 the upper limit of Kerbin's atmosphere was 69 km. Is it now 70?
Kerbin's atmosphere has, and continues to end, at 69,900 meters. There's an extra 0.9km you're missing there and yes, that has always been there for as long as I can remember.
Because the number was just not quite right.

It used to be about 69.1 from version 0.1x (not sure which version exactly, I started with 0.16 and it was 69.1 km then), through version 0.90. In version 1.0, it seems to have changed to 70 km.
